item.title: CVE-2024-35753|2024-06-10T18:46:14.722Z -- templatesnext -- templatesnext%20onepager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in TemplatesNext TemplatesNext OnePager allows Stored XSS.This issue affects TemplatesNext OnePager: from n/a through 1.3.3.
